PROJECT(FLTKVW)

SET(FLTKVW_SRCS
   Flv_List.cxx
   Flv_Style.cxx
   Flv_Table.cxx
   Flv_List.H
   Flv_Style.H
   Flv_Table.H
   MOOSFLTKUI.h
   FLTKCheckList.h)

SET(FLTKVW_HEADERS
   Flv_List.H
   Flv_Style.H
   Flv_Table.H
   MOOSFLTKUI.h
   FLTKCheckList.h)


FIND_PACKAGE( FLTK REQUIRED)


IF(FLTK_FOUND)
  INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${FLTK_INCLUDE_DIR})
  ADD_LIBRARY(fltkvw ${FLTKVW_SRCS})
ELSE(FLTK_FOUND)
  MESSAGE("FLTKVW: FLTK not found. FLTKVW won't be built.")
ENDIF(FLTK_FOUND)


# install headers
INSTALL( FILES ${FLTKVW_HEADERS} DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/include/FLTKVW )

IF(FLTK_FOUND)
# install libraries
INSTALL(TARGETS
fltkvw
RUNTIME DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib
LIBRARY DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib
ARCHIVE DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib
)
ENDIF(FLTK_FOUND)
